decision_conditions: Given the nature of the proposed amendment and considering the original planning conditions, the proposal would meet the Council's criteria for non-material amendments due to the following reasons:

- 	There would be no material impact on any neighbours or other statutory and non-statutory bodies, and the resulting scheme would not be materially different in its external appearance and would remain within the fee paid and in accordance with the adopted policies of the Council.
- 	The changes would not compromise the overall design and appearance of the development.
-  	The resulting scheme would not conflict with any existing planning conditions or legal agreement.

Therefore, the proposal represents a 'non-material' change from the original planning application with regards to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and will not require assessment through the submission of a full planning application.

| The description of development is hereby amended to 'Conversion of existing building to form additional residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage.'.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow to make minor alterations in relation to planning permission reference 223365FUL dated 15/02/2023 (as amended by application ref: 233453NMA dated 19.09.2023) for 'Conversion of existing building from 2no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage'
